properties.entry: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , R_TITLE , R_CONTENT , R_DATE , SCORE , USER_NO , STATUS , PLAY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , DEFAULT , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTECHMENT ( FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL , PLACE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 1 , PLAY_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL )

SELECT R_TITLE , R_CONTENT , R_DATE , SCORE , USER_NAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN ATTECHMENT A ON R.PLAY_NO = A.PLACE_NO WHERE PLAY_NO = ? ORDER BY R.R_DATE DESC
